771             "pipe:1",  # 将输出写入管道
772         ],
773         stdin=subprocess.PIPE,
774         stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
775         stderr=subprocess.PIPE,

777     out, _ = process.communicate(input=data.tobytes())
results.issue_text: Starting a process with a partial executable path
